section.title: Techniques
section.para: This section goes over some applications of this library that go beyond it's goal of allowing you to format sequential types to a stream.

section.title: Serialization
section.para: This library can be used to perform simple serialization. See libs/outfmt/example/serialize.cpp for examples on doing this. Robert Ramey's Boost.Serialization library is now a part of Boost and offers better serialization facilities.
